commands.name: index
commands.title: movie posters icons
commands.subtitle: fetch-movie-poster
commands.description: monitors a specified directory on your macOS system for newly added subdirectories (movie folders) and automatically sets a custom icon for each folder based on the movie's poster. It leverages the TMDB API to fetch the movie poster and AppleScript to set the directory icon. Hereâ€™s a breakdown of its functionality

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
